body_html:
To help @abhinavbh08 a bit more: the issue has been fixed in the master branch of the source code on github, but not in the current 0.3.1 release. To complie and use the code from the master branch, you can

# Follow instructions at this URL:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source

Another workaround is to use the QRNN type of RNN, which does not produce the error and works fine for me:
https://github.com/salesforce/pytorch-qrnn

body:
To help @abhinavbh08 a bit more: the issue has been fixed in the master branch of the source code on github, but not in the current 0.3.1 release. To complie and use the code from the master branch, you can

```
# Follow instructions at this URL:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source
 ```

Another workaround is to use the QRNN type of RNN, which does not produce the error and works fine for me:
[https://github.com/salesforce/pytorch-qrnn](https://github.com/salesforce/pytorch-qrnn)
